title: Healthy by Nature Acupuncture Ancient healing wisdom for modern health and wellness
description: Linda Meyer and Miguel Bautista of Healthy by Nature Acupuncture provide acupuncture treatments for stress, pain, headaches, migraines, weight, insomnia, and fertility, for the communities of Cary, Crystal Lake, Algonquin, Lake in the Hills, McHenry, Huntley, and Woodstock. - Linda Meyer, LAc
cleaned_text: Linda Meyer, Acupuncturist - Diplomate in Acupuncture (NCCAOM) - Licensed Acupuncturist (IL) - Master of Science in Oriental Medicine - Bachelor of Science in Nutrition - Graduate of Midwest College of Oriental Medicine - Previous history of 25 years in the field of radiology - Sees clients in the [Lake in the Hills office](http://myhealthybynature.com/page/lake-in-the-hills-il/) - Commonly treats: acute & chronic pain, tension & migraine headaches, orthopedic & sports injuries, menstrual difficulties, thyroid, adrenal & reproductive hormone balancing, fatigue, insomnia, menopause & aging, asthma, allergies, digestive problems, anxiety, depression, plus many more issues. "I am passionate about working with clients who have made the decision to take charge of their health and wellbeing. My practice is geared toward whole health, treating the entire person - body, mind, and spirit - with a strong belief that all three are crucial to regaining wellness. My treatment style is based in Traditional Chinese Medicine techniques, including acupuncture, acupressure, Chinese bodywork, cupping, gua sha, crystal & stone medicine, essential oils, and herbal formulas, as well as incorporating additional healing modalities, such as yoga postures, exercise, meditation,
